text: وَإِذَا حَضَرَ ٱلۡقِسۡمَةَ أُوْلُواْ ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ وَٱلۡيَتَٰمَىٰ وَٱلۡمَسَٰكِينُ فَٱرۡزُقُوهُم مِّنۡهُ وَقُولُواْ لَهُمۡ قَوۡلٗا مَّعۡرُوفٗا

translation.en: And when [other] relatives and orphans and the needy are present at the [time of] division, then provide for them [something] out of the estate and speak to them words of appropriate kindness
translation.id: (Dan apabila sewaktu pembagian itu hadir beberapa kerabat,179) anak-anak yatim dan orang-orang miskin, maka berilah mereka dari harta itu180) (sekedarnya) dan ucapkanlah kepada mereka perkataan yang baik
